Maintain, regularly update and develop new content for organization s website and social media platforms     Maintain the organization s video and photo library for future use     Designing creatives for communication purpose     Write content for and design organisation s Annual Report     Write content for and design Quarterly Newsletter     Any other task assigned related to job profile assigned by Supervisor
